episodes.title: “The Cult Leader Who Stole Gold and Vanished Forever | Crime Stories”
episodes.description:
A prophet, a cult, and a fortune in hidden gold… then he vanished. This is the chilling story of Brother XII, the cult leader who deceived his followers, escaped with their wealth, and left behind a death certificate many believe was forged. Did he really die, or did he disappear to live under a new identity?

Join us as we dive into one of the most mysterious vanishing acts in cult history.

#TrueCrime #CultMystery #Unsolved #CrimeStories #DarkHistory
